name: Streadata.io API Gallery - APIs.Guru
description: This is a repository of apis.guru APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: APIs.Guru
apis.description: Our goal is to create a machine-readable Wikipedia for REST APIs with the following principal: Open source, community driven project. Only publicly available APIs (free or paid). Anyone can add or change an API, not only API owners. All data can be accessed through a REST API
